name: NR Standalone High-Band with Multiple PCell Support
summary: This feature introduces support for multiple PCells for each sector in an NR standalone

parameters.name: NRCellDU.secondaryCellOnly
parameters.description: This attribute must be set to false on the                                 PCells.

parameters.name: TrStSaCellProfileUeCfg.actionAtRelease
parameters.description: This attribute must be set to RANDOM_REDIRECT  to                                 activate the random redirect at release function.

parameters.name: UeMCNrFreqRelProfileUeCfg.connModeAllowedPCell
parameters.description: This attribute must be set to true only for the                                     NRFreqRelation MO instances                                 thatreference                                 PCell frequencies.

activation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to ACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012706 MO instance.
deactivation_step: 1. Set the FeatureState.featureState attribute to DEACTIVATED in the FeatureState=CXC4012706 MO instance.
